name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora, Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare perform a cover of the song 'Kiseki'.
Usada Pekora transitions into an announcement section for her Birthday Celebration 2024 goods.

subtitles.original: 明日、今日よりも好きになれる
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, I'll love you even more than today

subtitles.original: 溢れる想いが止まらない
subtitles.english: These overflowing feelings won't stop

subtitles.original: 今もこんなに好きでいるのに
subtitles.english: Even though I love you this much right now

subtitles.original: 言葉に出来ない
subtitles.english: I can't put it into words

subtitles.original: 君のくれた日々が積み重なり
subtitles.english: The days you gave me piled up

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去った日々 2人歩いた『軌跡』
subtitles.english: The days that passed, the 'path' we two walked

subtitles.original: 僕らの出逢いがもし偶然ならば?
subtitles.english: If our meeting was just a coincidence?

subtitles.original: 運命ならば? 君に巡り合えた それって『奇跡』
subtitles.english: If it was fate? That I could meet you, that's a 'miracle'

subtitles.original: 2人寄り添って歩いて 永久の愛を形にして
subtitles.english: Walking close together, giving form to eternal love

subtitles.original: いつまでも君の横で 笑っていたくて
subtitles.english: I want to be laughing by your side forever

subtitles.original: アリガトウや Ah 愛してるじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Saying 'Thank you' or 'I love you' is still...

subtitles.original: 足りないけどせめて言わせて 「幸せです」と
subtitles.english: ...not enough, but at least let me say, "I'm happy"

subtitles.original: いつも君の右の手のひらを
subtitles.english: Always, your right palm...

subtitles.original: ただ僕の左の手のひらが
subtitles.english: ...is just held by my left palm

subtitles.original: そっと包んでくそれだけで
subtitles.english: Just by gently wrapping around it

subtitles.original: ただ愛を感じていた
subtitles.english: I felt nothing but love

subtitles.original: 日々の中で 小さな幸せ
subtitles.english: In the middle of our days, small bits of happiness

subtitles.original: 見つけ重ね ゆっくり歩いた『軌跡』
subtitles.english: Finding and piling them up, the 'path' we walked slowly

subtitles.original: 僕らの出逢いは大きな世界で
subtitles.english: Our meeting, in this big world

subtitles.original: 小さな出来事 巡り合えた それって『奇跡』
subtitles.english: Is a small event, but meeting you, that's a 'miracle'

subtitles.original: うまく行かない日だって 2人で居れば晴れだって
subtitles.english: Even on days when things don't go well, if we're together it's sunny

subtitles.original: 強がりや寂しさも 忘れられるから
subtitles.english: Because I can forget my bluffing and loneliness

subtitles.original: 僕は君でなら 僕でいれるから!
subtitles.english: Because if it's you, I can be myself!

subtitles.original: だからいつもそばに居てよ 『愛しい君へ』
subtitles.english: So please stay by my side always, 'to my beloved'

subtitles.original: 2人ふざけあった帰り道
subtitles.english: On the way home when the two of us were fooling around

subtitles.original: それも大切な僕らの日々
subtitles.english: Those too are our precious days

subtitles.original: 「想いよ届け!!!」と伝えた時に
subtitles.english: When I said, "Let my feelings reach you!!!"

subtitles.original: 初めて見せた表情の君
subtitles.english: The expression you showed for the first time

subtitles.original: 少し間が空いて 君がうなずいて
subtitles.english: A small silence, then you nodded

subtitles.original: 僕らの心 満たされてく愛で
subtitles.english: Our hearts were being filled with love

subtitles.original: 僕らまだ旅の途中で
subtitles.english: We're still in the middle of our journey

subtitles.original: またこれから先も何十年
subtitles.english: And for decades to come

subtitles.original: 続いていけるような未来へ
subtitles.english: Towards a future that can continue

subtitles.original: 2人寄り添って歩いて 永久の愛を形にして
subtitles.english: Walking close together, giving form to eternal love

subtitles.original: いつまでも君の横で 笑っていたくて
subtitles.english: I want to be laughing by your side forever

subtitles.original: アリガトウや Ah 愛してるじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Saying 'Thank you' or 'I love you' is still...

subtitles.original: 足りないけどせめて言わせて 「幸せです」と
subtitles.english: ...not enough, but at least let me say, "I'm happy"

subtitles.original: うまく行かない日だって 2人で居れば晴れだって
subtitles.english: Even on days when things don't go well, if we're together it's sunny

subtitles.original: 喜びや悲しみも 全て分け合える
subtitles.english: We can share all the joy and sadness

subtitles.original: 君が居るから 生きていけるから!
subtitles.english: Because you're here, because I can keep living!

subtitles.original: だからいつもそばに居てよ 『愛しい君へ』
subtitles.english: So please stay by my side always, 'to my beloved'

subtitles.original: 最後の一秒まで
subtitles.english: Until the very last second

subtitles.original: 明日、今日より笑顔になれる
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, I can smile even more than today

subtitles.original: 君が居るだけで そう思えるから
subtitles.english: Just because you're here, I can think so

subtitles.original: 何十年 何百年 何千年 時を越えよう
subtitles.english: For decades, centuries, millennia, let's cross time

subtitles.original: 君を愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: ここで告知セカァアアアアン！！
subtitles.english: Now for the announcement section!!

subtitles.original: 今年も出ます！兎田ぺこら誕生日記念グッズ2024！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: This year too, Usada Pekora Birthday Celebration Goods 2024 are coming! Yay!

subtitles.original: まずはラインナップはこちら！ドーン！
subtitles.english: First, here is the lineup! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 今回はライブのテーマでもある学校グッズ！
subtitles.english: This time it's school goods, which is also the theme of the live!

subtitles.original: これを手にするだけで、UPアカデミー生になれる！
subtitles.english: Just by getting these, you can become a UP Academy student!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ひとつずつ見ていくぺこ！ひとつ目はこちら！
subtitles.english: Let's look at them one by one, peko! First one is this!

subtitles.original: 卒業証書！
subtitles.english: Graduation certificate!
